why_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_us.subtitle: We are committed to providing you with the best car rental experience.

about.title: About Our Company
about.intro: Welcome to Estibyan Car Rental, your trusted partner for mobility in the capital. Founded in 2010, we have grown to become a leading name in the car rental industry.
about.vision_text: To be the number one choice for car rentals in Abu Dhabi, known for our exceptional service, modern fleet, and customer-centric approach.
about.mission_text: To provide a seamless, reliable, and affordable car rental experience for residents and tourists alike, ensuring their journey in the UAE is comfortable and memorable.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.rental_policy_text: Minimum rental period is 24 hours. Cars must be returned with the same fuel level as at pickup.
terms.renter_req_text: Minimum age is 21. A valid driving license held for at least one year and a valid credit card are required.
terms.cancellation_text: Cancellations made 48 hours before pickup are free of charge. A fee may apply for later cancellations.
terms.insurance_text: All our cars come with comprehensive insurance. Deductible amounts apply in case of at-fault accidents.
